thread.title: This Gym Found Out What Happens When You Try to Shame Pizza Eaters
thread.title_full: This Gym Found Out What Happens When You Try to Shame Pizza Eaters

author: jkatzowitz@thedailydot.com (Josh Katzowitz)
title: This Gym Found Out What Happens When You Try to Shame Pizza Eaters
text:
Photo via Hajime NAKANO/Flickr | Photo via Naija Gym Blog/Twitter (CC-BY) At least the gym had a sense of humor about it. 
When the Naija Gym Twitter account recently posted a status update in which it tried to shame pizza lovers, comparing them to olive oil guzzlers, the internet collectively went bonkers. Twitter users fought back hard, and they fought back often. 
But can you blame them? I mean, just look at this bullshit. Two slices of pizza are the equivalent to swallowing 3 spoons of warm oil. Do you feel like eating pizza now? pic.twitter.com/MXBl9lFIYv — Naija Gym Blog (@naijagym) February 16, 2017 Almost immediately, the internet weighed in with ridicule at the content and with the wonder at how a Twitter account could be so wrong about one of life’s greatest pleasures. Don't we, after all, work out at the gym solely so we can come home and eat pizza afterward? — christine teigen (@chrissyteigen) February 19, 2017 @naijagym I had to stop and get some pizza half way through this article. — Valle Grace (@giggleferocious) February 19, 2017 @naijagym yes but make it 3 slices. i'm extra hungry.
